DataElement.preferredName: Serum Ferritin Laboratory Procedure Outcome Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed related to the assessment of the clear liquid part of the blood that remains after blood cells and clotting proteins have been removed with an iron protein complex, containing up to 23% iron, formed by the union of ferric iron with apoferritin.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to result from the assessment of the clear liquid part of the blood that remains after blood cells and clotting proteins have been removed with an iron protein complex, containing up to 23% iron, formed by the union of ferric iron with apoferritin.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The clear liquid part of the blood that remains after blood cells and clotting proteins have been removed.:An iron protein complex, containing up to 23% iron, formed by the union of ferric iron with apoferritin; it is found in the intestinal mucosa, spleen, bone marrow, reticulocytes, and liver, and regulates iron storage and transport from the intestinal lumen to plasma.:A medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood, urine, or other substance from the body. Tests can help determine a diagnosis, plan treatment, check to see if treatment is working, or monitor the disease over time.

Concepts.definition: The clear portion of the blood that remains after the removal of the blood cells and the clotting proteins.

An iron protein complex, containing up to 23% iron, formed by the union of ferric iron with apoferritin; it is found in the intestinal mucosa, spleen, bone marrow, reticulocytes, and liver, and regulates iron storage and transport from the intestinal lumen to plasma.
Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: A phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: Serum Ferritin Laboratory Procedure Outcome Value
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed for serum ferritin lab result.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

DataElement.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
